scripts.start: npm run remove_outdated_builds && npm run build_ui && npm run build_electron_backbone && npm run copy_ui && npm run start_electron_app
scripts.remove_outdated_builds: echo "Step - 1: Removing outdated builds if any." && rm -rf ./app/ui/dist && rm -rf output
scripts.build_ui: echo "Step - 2: Building the UI." && cd ./app/ui && ng build --base-href ./
scripts.start_electron_app: echo "Step - 5: Starting the app." && node_modules\.bin\electron output/app/electron/index.js
